actionCalls.name: Trigger_Case_Assignment_Rules_to_Run
actionCalls.label: Trigger Case Assignment Rules to Run

assignments.name: Assign_CAS_Management_Bookkeeping_Fulfillment_Type
assignments.label: Assign CAS Management Bookkeeping Fulfillment Type

assignments.name: Assign_CAS_Management_Payroll_Fulfillment_Type
assignments.label: Assign CAS Management Payroll Fulfillment Type

assignments.description: Assigns to recordId to the Case Record
assignments.name: Assign_Case_ID
assignments.label: Assign Case ID

decisions.name: Accountant_Portal_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Accountant Portal Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Accountant_Portal_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR (5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11)) OR (12 AND 13) OR 14 OR (15 AND 16 AND 17)
rules.label: Accountant Portal Blank Values

rules.name: Advisory_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR (5 AND (6 OR 7)) OR 8 OR 9 OR 10
rules.label: Advisory Blank Values

decisions.name: Assignment_Adjustment_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Assignment Adjustment Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Assignment_Adjustment_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR (6 AND (7 OR 8)) OR 9 OR 10 OR 11
rules.label: Assignment Adjustment Blank Values

decisions.name: Bank_Issues_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Bank Issues Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Bookkeeping_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR (6 AND (7 OR 8)) OR 9 OR 10 OR 11
rules.label: Bookkeeping Blank Values

decisions.name: Entity_Management_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Entity Management Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Payroll_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR (6 AND (7 OR 8)) OR 9 OR 10 OR 11
rules.label: Payroll Blank Values

decisions.name: Quality_Assurance_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Quality Assurance Check for Blank Values

decisions.name: Tax_Compliance_Check_for_Blank_Values
decisions.label: Tax Compliance Check for Blank Values

rules.name: Tax_Compliance_Blank_Values
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR (7 AND 8) OR (7 AND (9 AND 10)) OR 11
rules.label: Tax Compliance Blank Values

Flow.description: A flow to assist in updating cases to the proper data structure

formulas.name: Determine_Fulfillment_Type
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Advisory}, {!Advisory}, {!Fulfillment_Type}, 'Bank Sync', 'Bank Sync', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Bookkeeping}, 'CAS Management', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Entity_Management}, {!Entity_Management}, {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Payroll}, 'CAS Management', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Portal_Issues_Updates}, 'Accountant Portal', {!Fulfillment_Type}, {!Tax_Compliance}, {!Tax_Compliance}, '')

formulas.description: Checks if we've already been passed the Contact ID, otherwise sets the Case Contact to be the Account's Primary Contact
formulas.name: DetermineContactID

formulas.description: Properly sets the Type field from the Fulfillment_Type picklist
formulas.name: Payroll_Bookkeeping_Portal_FulfillmentType

formulas.description: Transforms the value to standardize in the Accountant Portal User field
formulas.name: TransformPortalUserName

Flow.label: Case Update Flow

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Extra_Details_Explain
fields.fieldText: Please add any additional details to help resolve the case as quickly as possible. All fields are required.

fields.name: Extra_Users_Explain
fields.fieldText: If more than one additional user is required, enter their name, phone number, and email address on separate lines

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Case_Final_Review_Header
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1}Review Case details before updating{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Type_Explanation
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What kind of portal issues needs to be resolved?

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Additional_User_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Client needs an additional user added to their Portal. Please enter the required fields below: {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Changes_to_Portal_Information_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Other changes or updates needed to the Client's portal. Enter details on the next page {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Portal_Error_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Client is seeing page errors when trying to use the Portal. Please select an error below. {!Brand_Style_Close}


If the client is having trouble with the merchant payment portion of the Portal, please have them call 844-577-5570 or submit a ticket to invoicing@1800accountant.com

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Additional_User_Extra_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} If the client needs more than one additional user, please add all required information into the Description field on the next screen {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Extra_User_Unique_Email
fields.fieldText: Please enter an email address that is unique from the existing client's email address

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Error_Type_Other_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} If the client is seeing other errors in the portal, please add relevant details in the "Other:" field {!Brand_Style_Close}﻿

fields.name: Accountant_Portal_Error
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


You must fill out all the fields on the previous screen to create your case.


﻿Please click "Previous" to fill out the required fields before submitting your case

fields.fieldText: Please add any additional details to help resolve the case as quickly as possible. All fields are required

fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} Which department is your case for? {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Type_of_Issue
fields.fieldText: Type of Issue

fields.name: Portal_Type_of_Issue
fields.fieldText: Type of Issue

fields.name: Billing_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Assign the case to the Billing Team.


This option may include issues such as:


  • Billing Inquiries
  • Invoice or Payment Issues
  • Cancellation Requests

﻿If the client is having trouble with the merchant payment portion of the Portal, please have them call 844-577-5570 or submit a ticket to invoicing@1800accountant.com

fields.name: Fulfillment_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Assign the case to the Fulfillment Team.


This option may include issues such as:


  • Tax Compliance
  • Reassignments
  • Advisory
  • Bookkeeping
  • Payroll
  • Entity Formation
  • Portal Issues, Etc.

fields.name: Quality_Assurance_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Assign the case to the Quality Assurance Team.


This option may include issues for the following teams:


  • Billing
  • Fulfillment
  • Sales
  • Payment Disputes
  • Other

fields.name: Sales_BNA_Record_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
Assign the case to the BNA Team.


This option may include issues such as:


  • Initiating contact from BNA reps for upsell opportunities

fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What kind of tax compliance issue needs to be resolved?

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Assignment_Adjustment_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Issues that require a change in tax preparer {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Notices_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} The client received tax notices and needs assistance {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Tax_Returns_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} The client needs assistance with delays or errors on their tax return {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Non_Tax_Prep_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} The client needs assistance with a non-tax prep related product. This includes products such as:

  • Sales & Use Tax
  • Estimated Taxes
  • 1099 Prep
  • Extensions
  • 1023 Prep
  • State Tax Filing for Non Tax Prep {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Escalation_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues where the client is unhappy and request the issue to be escalated {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Offboarding_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues where the client needs to be offboarded from their Tax Prep services {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Reassignment_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Issues where a change in a client's tax prep team is requested. Select a reassignment reason below {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Error
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


You must fill out all the fields on the previous screen to create your case.


﻿Please click "Previous" to fill out the required fields before submitting your case

fields.name: rollback_test
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while updating the case. This can sometimes occur if you change the case Type on the review screen.


Please either return to the previous screen to correct the issue or start from the beginning.

screens.name: Type_of_Billing_Issue
screens.label: Type of Billing Issue

fields.name: Select_Billing_Case_Type
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} Please select a Type and Sub-Type for the case {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Invoice_And_Payments_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Cases that pertain to a client's questions/issues with a subscription, invoice, or a transaction {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Subscription_Review_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Cases for either a partial or full cancellation request {!Brand_Style_Close}


This case type should ONLY be submitted when a direct request to cancel is received from the client

fields.name: Chargeback_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Chargeback issues or questions {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Payment_Issue_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Transaction questions or concerns. Includes issues with payments, refunds, or updates to payment methods {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Invoice_Issue_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Invoices that need adjustments {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Billing_Inquiry_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H3} General billing questions about their subscription, invoice, or transaction. Examples include:

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} What is my renewal date?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}What services am I paying for?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}When is my next invoice due?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}I have not received my refund yet (issued by 1-800Acountant, not their tax refund)
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Why did my payment decline?
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}I need assistance updating my billing address
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}I'd like to remove a payment method {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Cancel_Request_Sub_type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a full subscription cancellation of a client's services {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Partial_Cancel_Request_Sub_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Requests for a partial cancellation of a client's services {!Brand_Style_Close}

screens.helpText: Please be sure to fill out both fields.

fields.name: BNA_Display
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H1} Please be specific on what additional services or products the client needs from the Business Needs Analysis team.

{!Brand_Style_Close}


All fields are required.


﻿If the client needs an appointment scheduled, please use the universal scheduler rather than create a case

fields.name: Fulfillment_Display
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What's the primary type of fulfillment-related issue that needs to be addressed? {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Does_the_Client_have_multiple_issues_to_report
fields.fieldText: Does the Client have multiple issues to report?

fields.name: Case_Secondary_Reason_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} If there are secondary reasons for the case then please select all applicable options. {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Fulfillment_Type
fields.fieldText: Primary Issue

fields.name: Advisory_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Advisory {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Missed Discovery appointments, Advisory appointments, or other Advisory issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Bank_Issues_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Bank Issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Bank Account Sync Issues
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Missing Transactions
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Duplicate Transactions {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Bookkeeping_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Bookkeeping {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Escalation, Offboarding, or other Bookkeeping issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Entity_Management_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Entity Management {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Submit requests for Formations, EIN, Registered Agent, Dissolutions, etc. {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Payroll_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Payroll {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Escalation, Offboarding, or other Payroll issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Portal_Issues_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Portal Issues {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} VTO lock issues (assuming payment is verified
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}1-800Accountant Access "Free Trial Ended" issues (assuming payment is verified
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Can't message team members
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Adding a Partner Account
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Adding an additional Business Account {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Reassignments_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Reassignments {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Reassignment requests for Advisory, Tax Preparer, Bookkeeping, or Payroll. Ex. "I'd like a new advisor"
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Reassignment requests for Industry or language
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Issues that need to be escalated to a manager
  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3}Offboarding notices for services (Subscription should be cancelled before this case is created){!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Tax_Compliance_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText:
{!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Tax Compliance {!Brand_Style_Close}

  • {!Brand_Style_Start_H3} Return Issues, Notices, Reassignments, Form 1023, Sales & Use Tax, or other issues ex. "There were errors on my taxes"{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Quality_Assurance_Display
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H1} What kind of Quality Assurance-related issue needs to be addressed? {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Billing_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with Billing {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Fulfillment_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with Fulfillment {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Payment_Disputes_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with payment disputes {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Sales_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Concerns or Issues with Sales {!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Other_Type_Explain
fields.fieldText: {!Brand_Style_Start_H2} Other issues needing attention from the Quality Assurance Team. This includes Portal issues or other items that don't fit into any existing category{!Brand_Style_Close}

fields.name: Other_Sub_Type_Explain
